EmailTemplate.name: ATS Charge Number Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber} : {!Case.Subject} Charge Number Authorization
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings,
You (or your delegate) are authorized to charge up to XX hours against the charge number provided to work the referenced C&PS issue only. If you require additional hours please notify the sender. Please note the SR or Case number in the comment field of your time reporting system (E-charge or TWB).
* Charge Number :
* C&PS Issue : {!Case.CaseNumber}
*******************************************************************************************************
NOTE : Deliberate misuse or falsification of this charge number is violation of company policy which may result in disciplinary action up to and including termination
*******************************************************************************************************
